description: In the anime, it is revealed that Maira, a former Pawn, became a Bishop by gaining the Ã„RM Vaqua. He is not given a backround in the manga. Maira is a black-cloaked masked man who takes pleasure in engulfing and digesting people with Vaqua. Vaqua is a resemblance to a yugioh card that marik uses called "revival jam". Maira is first seen watching the War Game battle between Ginta Toramizu and Garon. During the second round of the War Games, Maira reappears as a fighter for the Chess Pieces. He has the last of the battles in that round, and goes up against Dorothy.
name: Maira
